nav.div: Bolivar Schools » News » What's New » Coronavirus Information

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span:
It is easy to Be Great when things are going great and easy to Be Strong in times of strength. The measure of a person is how they respond in times of stress and weakness. In the times we are dealing with now, we are going to show exactly what we are all about and will truly reveal our "Why." We are Blessed to live in this community and work in Bolivar School District!
Our priorities at this point will be keeping our students, staff and community safe. Next, find ways to recapture some semblance of "normal," and engage our students back into the learning process. For all information regarding Bolivar Schools and COVID-19 please go here. Let’s work together to stay healthy and Liberator Strong!
